item.title: UN-HABITAT.:. Strengthening Training Institutions | News | Sharing Liberian common "cents"
item.description:
UN-HABITAT.:. Strengthening Training Institutions | News | Sharing Liberian common "cents"

Â© UN-HABITAT/John hogan How governments choose to spend their taxpayers money is a sensitive issue in most countries, and Liberia is no different. Years of conflict has meant that there has been little to no effective government outside of Monrovia.

item.title: Urban Planning for City Leaders | Cities Alliance
item.description:
Urban Planning for City Leaders | Cities Alliance

The Cities Alliance is a global partnership for urban poverty reduction and the promotion of the role of cities in sustainable development.

item.title: Njeri Rionge
item.description:
Njeri Rionge

Described by Forbes as 'One of Africa's most successful serial entrepreneurs', Njeri Rionge has over Two decades of leadership experience working with both start-ups and large corporations. She is the President & CEO of NRBC Inc., a business advisory and financial services firm run by entrepreneurs and expert partners focused on African investment opportunities.

item.description:
Login - MyPSUP

Participatory Slum Upgrading Programme - A UN-HABITAT programme in cooperation with the European Commission and the Africa, Caribbean and Pacific (ACP) Secretariat.

item.title: Vienna hosts first mayoral conference on City Prosperity Initiative
item.description:
Vienna hosts first mayoral conference on City Prosperity Initiative

Vienna 30 July 2015- Over 100 participants, including more than 20 mayors and other high ranking municipal and national officials, last week participated in the first Mayoral Conference on the City Prosperity Initiative held at the United Nations Office in Vienna.
